title: Can't connect to chat
body: Hello, since this afternoon I haven't been able to connect to chat on EUW. I tried reinstalling, repairing, changing server, opening as admin and restarting pc. Now I don't know what to do.. ANyone who can help?

replies.body: Those EU authentication issues *should* be ironed out by now, so give it a go if you haven't yet. Definitely hit me back up if you still can't and I do a little more digging into the situation for ya!
